amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-698 as En Bloc No. 4: Nos. 55, as modified, 57, 58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, 68, 69, and 70.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Thornberry amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to amendment No. 55 printed in House Report 115-698.
Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
